${ModID}:Arson.NAME: Arson
${ModID}:Arson.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Unfreeze any ${ModID}:Frozen cards in your hand (reducing their cost to 0 until played).

${ModID}:ExtendedStall.NAME: Extended Stall
${ModID}:ExtendedStall.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Freeze the highest-cost card in your hand.
${ModID}:ExtendedStall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Freeze the highest-cost card in your hand.

${ModID}:FlashFreeze.NAME: Flash Freeze
${ModID}:FlashFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Freeze a card in your hand.

${ModID}:Prime.NAME: Prime
${ModID}:Prime.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot and 1 Focus. NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.
${ModID}:Prime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots and 1 Focus. NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.

${ModID}:FrozenSnack.NAME: Frozen Snack
${ModID}:FrozenSnack.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Snack to your hand and ${ModID}:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrozenSnack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Snack+ to your hand and ${ModID}:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hailstorm.NAME: Hailstorm
${ModID}:Hailstorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Channel !M! Frost.

${ModID}:MegaChill.NAME: Mega Chill
${ModID}:MegaChill.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Frost for each *Frozen card in hand. NL ${ModID}:Freeze your hand.
${ModID}:MegaChill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Freeze your hand. NL Channel !M! Frost for each *Frozen card in hand.
